overview: Paul Lo is the founder and CEO of Foodstream (Chevia, Inc.), a location-based discovery startup. He was an early employee at Yahoo!, where he built Yahoo!’s membership services from the ground up and has invented a social network aggregation platform that powers Yahoo! Updates. He was also co-founder of E-Steam, a data mining company that was winner of KDD Cup 2000, an annual worldwide data mining competition. Paul received a M.S. in Computer Science at Stanford University and B.Eng. in Computer Science at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology.

degrees.subject: Computer Science
degrees.institution: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
